question:
Consider the following statements: 
1. Wheat is the Gift of the Old world to the New World 
2. Maize is the Gift of the New World to the Old World  Which among the above statements is / are correct ?
explanation: Both the staetments are true. The Wheat is the gift of the Old world to the new world. It is used as staple food in the world from quite some time. The maize is the gift of New world as it came to the picture much later.
